snippet.title: TAnima (Action Roguelite Deckbuilder) - Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
TAnima Demo is finally released! This video is a gameplay of my last playtest. Now it's time to make some devlogs :) 

Check out demo! Join us on Discord! 

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/sfgr7YCv2z
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1335520/TAnima/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/ByerNDev

0:00 - Tutorial
1:46 - Meet Lena
4:05 - First time in the Last Door
5:45 - Looking for Karol
7:27 - Meet Karol
10:47 - Karol Shop
12:33 - Cards Tutorial
16:00 - Going for more Card Slots
17:00 - Death/Upgrade Cards introduction
19:53 - Going for more Card Slots again
22:24 - Gaining more Card Slots
24:04 - Tips from Lena
26:26 - Demo Boss Run #1 
32:36 - Demo Boss Run #1 F2
34:16 - Demo Boss Run #2
38:37 - Demo Boss Run #2 F2
40:45 - Demo Boss Run #3
46:41 - Demo Boss Run #3 F2
48:24 - Demo Boss Run #4
53:32 - Demo Boss Run #4 F2
01:00:40 - Boss Fight
